FallColor_Description: changes the orange fall to green
RecolorMode_Description: changes the saturation, vibrant is more compatible with other mods, rustic is darker than both
DarkerPaths_Description: changes the white town path color to be darker
StaticFoliage_Description: replaces vanilla static trees and bushes
Desert_Description: replaces the desert terrain and foliage
DancingFlowers_Mushrooms_Description: replaces some tilesheet animations with dumb cute things
